basic_info.name: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences Admission Process
description: Admissions in Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences for
Admissions are purely based on EAMCET Rank, JEE(Mains) Rank, and intermediate marks (10+2).

A minimum of 25% marks will be required to score in EAMCET in order to make it to the merit list. Intermediate graduates with a minimum of 45% aggregate marks and (40% for SC and ST) can apply online for the exam.

In Annamacharya Institute of Technology And Sciences, one must qualify the TS-PGECET exam. The exams are in online mode. About 120 questions are asked in the exam and 25% that is 30 marks out of 120 is the minimum qualifying marks required for the general category candidates. There is no minimum cutoff mark for SC/ ST.

College accepts TS-ICET exams. TS ICET is conducted to provide admission to students into MBA programs offered by the universities in the state of Telangana. Students having 50%marks in graduation are allowed to apply for this entrance.

Candidates must qualify the TS POLYCET exam. POLYCET is a State level exam and the application is available in both online and offline mode. There is no age limit for this exam but an interested candidate must be a resident of Telangana/ Andra Pradesh.
Students interested in taking admission to this college can take any detailed information by visiting the college itself.

basic_info.name: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences Cutoff 2024
Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences Placements
description: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences [AITS], Telangana, Hyderabad has an impressive placement record. Every year a lot of companies visit this college. The college provides good placement with a high salary package every year. The salary package offered ranges between 3-8 LPA. Top recruiting companies like Cognizant and Mahindra visit the college for placements.
The placement team of the college throughout the year ensures successful and respectable placements with esteemed organizations.

During the recruitment process, the companies follow the general procedure like group discussion and face to face interviews and some other rounds and for this, the college conducts workshops for the students and try to teach the presentations skills, Group discussion skills, resume building skills, interview skills. Specific training sessions are given to students so that they can gain industry-level skills.
Read More: Annamacharya Institute of Technology & Sciences - [AITS], Hyderabad Placement Details]

basic_info.name: Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences -[AITS] FAQs

faqs.question: Is there any hostel facility available at Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences?
faqs.answer: Ans.Recently,the facility of hostels is provided to the students by the college for both boys and girls. The infrastructure of the hostels is good and safe.

faqs.question: Is there any event that takes place at Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana?
faqs.answer: Ans.Events such as workshops, Freshers, Farewell, Annual day, Visits, and Orientation programs are carried by the institution. Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences conducts many placement related programs for its students.

faqs.question: Can admission to Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences be taken without an entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Admission in this college is based on Engineering, Agriculture and Medicine Common Entrance Test EAMCET rank, JEE(Mains) Rank and can take admission with 10+2 marks.

faqs.question: What is the first year fees of B.Tech in Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana?
faqs.answer: Ans.The first-year fees for B.Tech in this college are about 66,000. For every specialization that is ECE, EEE, CSE, ME, CE is the same.

faqs.question: How is the faculty of Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences?
faqs.answer: Ans.The professors of Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana are professionals and Qualified with good teaching experiences. The faculty is very much helpful and supportive.

Section.name: About AITS
Section.description:
Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences is known as AITS HYD and was established in the year 2005 and is in Hyderabad, Telangana. The college is a part of the Annamacharya Educational Trust. Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences is an Engineering college and is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad. They play a vital role in the development of students. The college is private and provides UG, PG, and degree courses. The institution has great relations with the industries across the country. The mode of study is full time.
Table of Content
The college offers variations of courses in the field of UG, PG, and Diploma courses. There are 6 streams of Engineering in the UG course and many more in PG and Diploma courses.
Some of the major courses offered by the college are given below:

In Annamacharya Institute of Technology And Sciences, one must qualify the TS-PGECET exam. The exams are in online mode. About 120 questions are asked in the exam and 25% that is 30 marks out of 120 is the minimum qualifying marks required for the general category candidates. There is no minimum cutoff mark for SC/ ST.
College accepts TS-ICET exams. TS ICET is conducted to provide admission to students into MBA programs offered by the universities in the state of Telangana. Students having 50%marks in graduation are allowed to apply for this entrance.

Ques. Is there any hostel facility available at Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences?
Ans. Recently,the facility of hostels is provided to the students by the college for both boys and girls. The infrastructure of the hostels is good and safe.
Ques. Is there any event that takes place at Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana?
Ans. Events such as workshops, Freshers, Farewell, Annual day, Visits, and Orientation programs are carried by the institution. Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences conducts many placement related programs for its students.
Ques. Can admission to Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences be taken without an entrance exam?
Ans. Admission in this college is based on Engineering, Agriculture and Medicine Common Entrance Test EAMCET rank, JEE(Mains) Rank and can take admission with 10+2 marks.
Ques. What is the first year fees of B.Tech in Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana?
Ans. The first-year fees for B.Tech in this college are about 66,000. For every specialization that is ECE, EEE, CSE, ME, CE is the same.
Ques. How is the faculty of Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences?
Ans. The professors of Annamacharya Institute of Technology and Sciences, Telangana are professionals and Qualified with good teaching experiences. The faculty is very much helpful and supportive.
